name: Best Of Fight
description: Do you fight better? Pump you in style and congratulate all enemies in the “Best Of Fight” Pick up weapons first and destroy all around.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer: 32bit / 64bit Processor: Core 2 Duo or higher Memory: 2 GB RAM Storage: 50 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Core 4 Duo or higher Memory: 4 GB RAM Storage: 50 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
